Powers -- Male Human Veteran Warlock/Witch
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d6 Strength: d8 Vigor: d12+1
Attribute Notes: Divine Might: +2 Strength Step/+2 Vigor Step
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Healing: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d12
Boating: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Survival: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Psionics: (sma) d6
Gambling: (sma) d4 Research: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Faith: +1 Faith Step
Fame: +1 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Hard Of Hearing: -4 Notice (hearing)
Outsider+: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 10; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (7 points): Angel; Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch); Fame; Holy Light; New Powers; Power Points; Toughness +2 Hindrances: Hard Of Hearing; Outsider+; Shamed Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Angel: Has Ageless, Beautify, Divine Might, Faith, Flight, Immune To Disease And Poison, Rage, and Servant Of Heaven features
Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch): Has Corruption+, Familiar, and Material Components+ features
Servant Of Heaven: Has Vow+ feature
Ageless: Does not age
Fame: 2x fee from performing
Outsider+: Has no legal rights
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 11 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Thick Coat Shield: None Weapons: Bayonet (d8+d4); Colt 1911 (2d6+1 R12" AP 1); Knife (d8+d4 R3"); Unarmed (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Toughness+2: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Bayonet Parry Modifier: +1 Parry when wielded
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Holy Light: R12" May create and move a 3" radius dim or bright light or attack with a 9" cone or 12" stream that inflicts 2d4 damage
Immune To Disease And Poison: Has immunity to disease and poison
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 15
Powers:
Aspect Of The Rada Loa: (5 PP) RSelf Gives use of spirit-specific abilities for 1 hr
Consecrate Ground: (5 PP) RTouch 3" radius gives supernaturally good entities +2 Toughness and inflicts Distracted and Vulnerable (Raise also 2d4 damage) on evil entities for 1 hr (+5 PP Lasts until sunset)
Corpse Sense: (2 PP) RSelf Detects and allows vision and hearing through corpses in 1 mile radius (Raise 5 miles; Spirit neg for sentient undead) (+1 PP Caster can speak through nonsentient corpses)
Curse: (5 PP) RTouch Target suffers 1 level fatigue and an additional level each sunset (Spirit neg) (+2 PP Inflicts minor hindrance (Raise major))
Exorcism: (3+ PP) R12" Ritual banishes or destroys otherworldly being (Spirit neg) (+4 PP May exorcise unseen spirit)
Fury Of The Petro Loa: (5 PP) RSelf Gives use of spirit-specific abilities for 5 rd
Grave Shroud: (2 PP) R12" Target appears undead for 10 min (Spirit neg) (+1 PP/additional target)
Illusionary Horrors: (5 PP) RTouch Visions distract and influence target for 1 dy (+2 PP/additional target)
Locate: (3 PP) RSelf Gives direction of chosen item (-2 if self has never seen item) for 10 min (+1 PP Know best route to target)
Lock/Unlock: (1 PP) R12" Inflicts -4 to open on target item (Raise seals shut) or opens target item, ignoring 4 points of penalties (Raise disarms alarms and traps) (+1 PP Alerts self if unlocked)
Nightmares: (2 PP) RUnlimited Target suffers Night Terrors+ for 1 wk (+1 PP Add specific themes)
Sanctuary: (2 PP) RTouch Evil creatures cannot attack target (Spirit neg; Raise Spirit-2) for 5 rd; attacking ends (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; Epic +1 PP Spirit-2 (Raise Spirit-4))
Scrying: (3 PP) RSelf Gives view of chosen target (-2 unfamiliar target; Spirit target detects) for 5 rd (+1 PP Shares with allies in a 12" radius)
Seance: (5 PP) RSelf Allows asking a spirit 3 questions (+2 PP Speak w/demons; +2 PP Spirit performs a simple task)
Spite: (3 PP) RSelf Successful attackers suffer 1d6 damage per Wound inflicted for 5 rd
Summon Ally: (1+ PP) R12" Creates an obedient servant (Raise servant may take 1 Wound) for 5 rd (+1 PP Servant gains combat edge; +2 PP Servant can fly Pace"/rd; +1 PP Servant gains +1 Trait Step; +1 PP Self can use servant's senses; Epic +Half PP/additional servant)
Summon Demon: (3+ PP) R12" Ritual transports and binds a demon (Spirit neg) to perform a task
Suppress Transformation: (3 PP) RTouch Suppresses lycanthropy in target for 1 dy (+4 PP Permanent cure)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Warlock/Witch): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Beautify: May create minor beauty effects
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Familiar: Can communicate w/a magical, Wild Card pet that stores 5 Power Points
Material Components+: Suffers -4 arcane skill rolls when materials are unavailable; critical failure exhausts materials
